name: charge
effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.
flavor_text.emerald: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user charges power to boost the ELECTRIC move it uses next.
